title._content: Image taken from page 261 of 'The Argonauts of California. Being the reminiscences of scenes and incidents that occurred in California in early mining days. By a Pioneer ... Text and illustrations ... by C. W. H'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Argonauts of California. Being the reminiscences of scenes and incidents that occurred in California in early mining days. By a Pioneer ... Text and illustrations ... by C. W. H" Author: HASKINS, Charles Waldo. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10413.k.25.", "British Library DSC MFE/33/19040 *1*" Page: 261 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1890 Publisher: Fords and Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001612823 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
